text: @EddieZipperer @AOC It amazes me how sneaky racists are. Before the coronavirus, these racists were patiently supporting and patroning Chinese restaurants for decades and decades. Then suddenly, out of no where, as if they coordinated it on Twitter, BAM! They show their true colors. SMDH
